name: Pingle Studio
description:
Pingle Studio specializes in game development and porting existing projects to various platforms using the Unreal Engine and Unity.
Supported by the top industry experts from Ukraine and USA, Pingle Studio has built up a wide portfolio of projects, which includes the well-known titles Hello Neighbor, SpeedRunners, Life is Strange. Having a profound expertise in Unreal Engine and Unity, our team became a reliable partner for prominent players of video game industry, such as: tinyBuild, SquareEnix, 505 Games, Qualcomm etc.
